name: Energy Surge
text:
Choose one, then discard this obligation:
. Exhaust Containment Suit. If you cannot, exhaust your identity.
. Deal 1 damage to each character other than your identity and Cyclops/Scott Summers. This card gains surge.

name: Reign of Fire
text: After a bloody civil war, Vulcan has crowned himself emperor of the Shi'ar, and his forces now scour the galaxy for Havok and his allies. Forced Interrupt: When the villain phase ends, deal 1 indirect damage to each player. [star] Boost: Deal 1 indirect damage to each player. [hazard]

name: Vulcan
text: Retaliate 1. Reduce all damage dealt to Vulcan by 1. [[superpower]] cards cost 1 additional resource to play. (Havok's nemesis minion.)

name: Deathbird
text: Teamwork ([[imperial guard]]). [star] Forced Response: After Deathbird activates against you, place 1 troop counter on Shi'ar Legion. If you cannot, find Shi'ar Legion and put them into play engaged with the player with the fewest remaining hit points.

name: Shi'ar Legion
text: Enters play with 3 troop counters. [star] Shi'ar Legion gets +X SCH and +X ATK, where X equals the number of troop counters here. Forced Interrupt: When Shi'ar Legion would take damage, remove 1 troop counter from here instead.
